body.p:
There are three closed transition transfer procedures:
Internal permissive signal using Color Monitor to release the SKRU key
External permissive signal using dry contact or 120V input, bypassing Color Monitor
Two stage permissive signal: external signal enables internal signal
Select the procedure suitable for your configuration.

xi:include.href: Transfer Procedure Internal Permissive Signal Only.dita
Transfer Procedure External Permissive Signal Only.dita
Transfer Procedure External Plus Internal Permissive Signals.dita
